properties.Laboratory: Department of Geography and Earth Science, Aberystwyth University
properties.Notes (specify category etc): The Earth Observation and Ecosystem Dynamics Lab at Aberystwyth University are world leads in the application of spatial data for environmental modelling. Work is primarily undertaken through open source software and we produce the following software tools RSGISLib, ARCSI and SPDLib while contribute to many more including GDAL, KEALib and pylidar. We run an MSc in Remote Sensing and GIS with a focus on open source tools, scripting and analysis of large datasets.

properties.Laboratory: Indikatrix.org
Laboratory for Cartography and GIS, University of Nebraska
properties.Notes (specify category etc): Three different computer laboratories are used for geospatial instruction at the University of Nebraska at Omaha. The Cartography and GIS Laboratory pictured here is used for instruction in open-source technologies.

properties.Laboratory: LabSIG UNGS
Maynooth University
properties.Notes (specify category etc): In Maynooth University we have two important locations for GeoForAll. The Department of Computer Science carries out a wide range of research into VGI, Citizen Science, Geo Data Quality while the National Center for Geocomputation carries out research into geostatistics, survey, LiDar, population studies, etc.

properties.Notes (specify category etc): Since 2014 we have implemented the development of courses in the field of GIS and Remote Sensing with free and open source software, in order to educate professionals with better opportunities of development without relying on proprietary software licenses. We are involved in several research projects using free open source GIS software.
